page.title: 12BARNHAM RAILWAY STATION
page.content: The station was built in 1864.It has 4 platforms,1 ticket office and 1 signal box. The stations modernisation includes teleprinters,signalling equipment,ticket issuing machines and new announcing equipment. There are 34 staff at the station,this includes:1 traffic manager,2 booking clerks,3 signal men,8 platform staff,20 permament staff for repairs on the railways. On a survey made on the morning of June 14th 1985 the majority of people were going on holiday to Bognor Regis,Littlehampton and Chichester. By Reynold Peterson,Christian Peryagh,Mirella Spalding and Janet McHale.
